channel.title: Helix
channel.description: A high-performance personal blog built with SvelteKit and Material Design 3.

item.title: Hello World: SvelteKit + Material You
item.description: Welcome to my blog built with SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS, and Material Design 3 aesthetics. Fast, modern, and beautifully dark.

item.title: Optimizing for OLED: The Case for True Black
item.description: Why #000000 matters for OLED screens and how to build a dark theme that takes full advantage of pixel-off black.
